Disable Custom Stages 1.1 [Phantom Wings]
046B841C 48000040
Only needed if you have the Smash Stack file in /private/wii/app/RSBE/st on your SD card.

Enable Random Expansion Stages v1.1 [Phantom Wings]:
C26B7A6C 00000005
3860001F 2C120000
41820008 3860000A
7C101800 41800008
38000001 7C800379
60000000 00000000
This code causes every stage to be included in the random stage select, regardless of what is selected in the random stage select screen.
